entities.name: dobby

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is aware of Dobby's presence and his fear.

relationships.description: Harry is aware of Dobby's presence and his fear, as indicated by Harry hearing Dobby's breathing and seeing Dobby's quivering bat ears.
